version_description:
- Add support for recharges with Paypal.
- Add support for recharges with cash.
- Add helpdesk, FAQ and online support.
- Add info carrousel.
- Improve GPS performance and fix bugs.

- Add support for pay by space and plate in Aruba
- New main menu graphical style
- New side menu for the user
- Parking with map
- Multigateway support and cash/paypal recharge

1) Simplify the numeric entry plate
2) Support for indoor parking (subject to availability by city)
3) Improved Paypal payment process
4) Improved process bank card payment
5) simplifies the process of high user
6) Proofreading and bugs detected

You can now use iParkMe in Sant Cugat (Spain)!
We are still working to make iParkMe better:
- Prepayment or payment per transaction
- Improvements in performance and functionality
Bugs fixed.
Improvements in the signup process.
Bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.

Thank you for using iParkMe! In order to improve your experience with the app, we are constantly making updates.

In the newest version, you will find the option to pay in shopping centers (depending on your city) is activated, as well as the new shop owner module, so you can sign up for the plan and receive all the benefits.

We hope that you like it!
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

PaybyCel powered by iParkMe allows you to now pay for your parking in Canada as well. You will be able to pay using our app in some parking lots in Montreal, Ottawa and Toronto. 
Moreover you will find the following features in this version:

- A new Sign Up process, which is faster and more secure.
- Newer PCI-DSS payment platforms that allow us to reduce cost in certain countries.
- More cities in your current countries.
- A faster parking process, reducing steps.
- We have fixed all bugs detected and improved the app performance.

Versions 2.5.1 and 2.5.2 are in the oven, and soon we will bring you more features requested.

iParkMe allows you to now pay for your parking in Canada as well. Moreover you will find the following features in this version:

- A new Sign Up process, which is faster and more secure.  
- Newer PCI-DSS payment platforms that allow us to reduce cost in certain countries.
- More cities in your current countries.
- A faster parking process, reducing steps.
- We have fixed all bugs detected and improved the app performance.
Bugs fixed.
Bugs fixed.
Improves payment layouts for Canada.
Bug fixes and performance improvement.
Bug fixes and performance improvement.

We keep improving the application!
In the newest version, you can easily see how much parking time you have left, and you can add time or leave your parking spot in just a click.
Additionally, the new bank card gateway will allow us to decrease or even eliminate — depending on the country — the fee to add credit. Now iParkMe is much faster and more secure.
We are always working on the latest version so we can make the app better and better. Thank you!
Bugs fixed.

With the iParkMe app you can start parking in Gatineau (Les Enterprises Marc Dubé), Montreal (Safeway Parking), Ottawa (ParkSafe) and Toronto (Canada Wide Parking).
Bug fixes and stability improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements

We have improved the parking process with your help: map is visible now even for small displays, plate selection to avoid tickets due to a mistake and shorcuts to make faster to select your parking time.
This is a first sprint but a lot of new featurres are coming soon. Thanks for using iParkMe!!!
Performance improvements and error correction.

Thank you for trusting iParkMe. In this version you will find:
- Fewer steps to park, directly from the time selection your parking is confirmed.
- Your current parking is always visible. You can now see the remaining time or expand / leave parking with one click.
- Change city without closing session. Accessible in the user menu.
- More detail in the rates.
We update the app to make it faster and more reliable for you.
More details in rates and minor improvements.
Performance improvements and literals review
Performance improvements and revision of literals

We parked iParkMe. Now we drive Blinkay.

Welcome to Blinkay, a new name and a new image that reflects much better what we are and where we want to go.
We change everything. But nothing changes for you, except that the advantages you already enjoyed with us have added another: a better and more functional payment experience.
We hope you remain our co-pilot in this new stage.

The Blinkay team.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Small corrections and performance improvements. We want everything to work perfect before launching the following features.

Some errors have been corrected and performance improvements made.
Previous steps for the next round of new features.

Some errors have been corrected and performance improvements made.
Previous steps for the next round of new features.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thank you for using Blinkay! This version has important improvements which includes:
- Synchronization of START / STOP operations
- Speed and reliability
Please don't forget to rate us - thank you for your opinion!
General improvements and bug fixes. Thank you very much for your feedback and suggestions, they are very useful.

Hi Blinkers,

In this new version we have added new features and performance improvements described below:

a) Support for the management of the school area, and access to loading and unloading areas for commercial vehicles in Terrassa.
b) A more straightforward interface in the parking process, where you can clearly view the daily parking time slots.
c) You will be able to flag your favorite operations and have direct access to the map; regular users will be able to park without having to select vehicle, zone and fare.
d) The app is ready for the new BSM update and pursuing operations in Barcelona and metropolitan area.

Do you like Blinkay? Your feedback contributes to continuously improving the app. Remember to rate the app so other users know why Blinkay was useful.
Blinkers of Salt, with this version you can make use of the merchant campaigns in Salt.

Bug fixes and performance improvements. We release updates regularly, and we are always looking for ways to make things better. If you have any feedback or run into issues, come find us in support. We are happy to help
